VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers relative to the peak of Ethical Consumers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Tech-savvy Consumers is to the {right} of the peak of Ethical Consumers.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Tech-savvy Consumers show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Tech-savvy Consumers shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Convenience-Oriented} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =8.8?
EVJ.A: At X =8.8,the label with the highest density is {Ethical Consumers}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 65? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Budget Shoppers or Ethical Consumers?
NC.A: {Budget Shoppers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Ethical Consumers or Tech-savvy Consumers?
NC.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Ethical Consumers?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Budget Shoppers or Ethical Consumers?
NC.A: {Budget Shoppers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Convenience-Oriented}
